title: GMFB: Father's... Weekend?!
itunes:title: GMFB: Father's... Weekend?!
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The team talks about Nate’s present for Kyle on the show (:44); Kyle and Nate recapped their Father’s Day, and wonder if it should really be “Father’s Weekend,” (3:25); How Colts DB Darius Butler played a fun game on the show and getting athlete’s to open up on camera (19:46); Putting linebacker Brandon Magee through broadcast training and the challenge of moving from the field to behind the camera (20:55); and finally, Nate discusses his encounter with Commissioner Goodell and Antonio Brown at the NFL headquarters (25:22)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
